metadata.name: Genesis APE Head
metadata.description:
gm, and welcome to "3D APE KIT by HoloRolnik", our latest NFT project designed for all creative enthusiasts and collectors. As a 3D designer and digital artist collective, we are excited to present our custom collection inspired by our beloved Bored Ape Yacht Club. Our team has meticulously dissected every asset, texture, model, and facial expression from the OG collection and transformed them into a high-quality set of 3D objects.

This collection is specifically crafted for various creative purposes, including 3D animation, 3D printing, game design, VR and AR development, and virtual content creation. With "3D APE KIT by HoloRolnik," you will have access to an unparalleled set of AI and streaming tools to take your creative vision to new heights.

Our custom-designed assets include a vast array of 3D objects that are ready to use out of the box, with the ability to customize them to fit your specific requirements. From the intricate details of the apes' accessories to the expressions on their faces, we have put our heart and soul into creating a collection that is both stunning and versatile.

LFG! Start experimenting with the 3D APE KIT.

Is there a road map? How about a German Autobahn?

HoloRolnik
